snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry said he planned to raise his ideas  about how to persuade President Bashar al-Assad to agree to a political transition during a trip this month.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry says he plans to use his first foreign trip to advance new ideas about how to persuade Syria's Pres Bashar al-Assad to yield power and agree to political transition.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry said he planned to raise his ideas  about how to persuade President Bashar al-Assad to agree to a political transition during a trip this month.

headline.main: Kerry Says Trip Will Focus on Finding Syria Solution
headline.print_headline: Kerry Says Trip Will Focus on Finding Syria Solution
